title: v0.1.0 - Beta Release
content:
What's New

  • Initial release of Kanda
  • Basic functionality for linux emulation via Kanda Sessions
  • Basic functionality for creating and managing Kanda Scenarios
  • Basic functionality for AI-assisted Scenario creation
  • Basic functionality for AI-assisted Scenario evaluation

Known Issues

  • many !
raw:
## What's New

- Initial release of Kanda
- Basic functionality for linux emulation via Kanda Sessions
- Basic functionality for creating and managing Kanda Scenarios
- Basic functionality for AI-assisted Scenario creation
- Basic functionality for AI-assisted Scenario evaluation

## Known Issues

- many !
